    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bios_es_20070518_3_0031100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bios_es_20070518_3_0031100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El aparato locomotor</string>
            <string language="en">The locomotor system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das lokomotorische System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système locomoteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema locomotor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema locomotore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κινητήριο σύστημα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Secuencia didáctica que trata los tejidos óseo y muscular, los huesos, las articulaciones, los músculos y las lesiones del aparato locomotor.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching sequence which deals with bone and muscle tissues, the bones, the joints, the muscles and injuries to the locomotor system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">aparato locomotor</string>
            <string language="en">locomotor system</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Reihenfolge, welches Knochen- und 
Muskelgewebe, die Knochen, die Verbindungen, die Muskeln und die 
Verletzungen zum lokomotorischen System beschäftigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ordre d'enseignement ce qui traite des tissus d'os
et de muscle, les os, les joints, les muscles et des dommages au 
système locomoteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seqüência ensinando qual trata dos tecidos do 
osso e do músculo, dos ossos, das junções, dos músculos e dos 
ferimentos ao sistema locomotor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sequenza d'istruzione quale si occupa dei tessuti 
del muscolo e dell'osso, delle ossa, dei giunti, dei muscoli e delle 
lesioni al sistema locomotore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακολουθία διδασκαλίας που εξετάζει τους ιστούς 
κόκκαλων και μυών, τα κόκκαλα, τις ενώσεις, τους μυς και τους 
τραυματισμούς στο κινητήριο σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lokomotorisches System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système locomoteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
